en.sc1: The linked list before addAfter(). 15 is the value to be added, and node is the Node we want to add after.
en.sc2: Create a new Node with value 15.
en.sc3: The next field of the new list node is assigned to point to what node.getNext() points to.
en.sc4: node's next field is assigned to point to the new Node.
en.sc5: The new Node is in its correct position in the list.
en.sc6: We check if node was the same as the tail node, note the == ! If so, we also need to update tail.
en.sc7: Finally, increase the list size by 1.
